Name: Vorinclex, Apex of Mutation
Story Background: Vorinclex is a nightmarish fusion of Phyrexian and natural life, created by the insidious forces of New Phyrexia to be the ultimate predator on the plane of Mirrodin.
Ability: Trample, Infect, and whenever you cast a spell, proliferate. Whenever an opponent proliferates, they must pay 2 life for each permanent type they've chose (Artifact, creature, enchantment, land, planeswalker, or any combination thereof).
Appearance Description: Vorinclex is a towering, grotesque humanoid figure with twisted metal protrusions and glowing green, mutating veins pulsating through its corrupted flesh.
